pyfea.interfaces.aerosandbox¶

Airplane¶

Extension of the aerosandbox Airplane class adding PyFEA compatibility.

class pyfea.interfaces.aerosandbox.Airplane(name='Untitled Airplane', xyz_ref=None, mass_props=None, wings=[], s_ref=None, c_ref=None, b_ref=None)¶
gen_wing_mesh(wing)¶

Converts aerosandbox wing instances to triangular meshes This is messy code to make a messy process work

generate_mesh(meshtool='gmsh')¶

Creates an STL mesh for use with gmsh/CAD software
